summary: This is a JPMorgan Chase asset account portfolio statement for October 1999 for the 'FINANCIAL TRUST COMPANY, INC.', showing a portfolio valued at approximately $6.7 million. The key transaction is a wire transfer of $18.3 million to Bear Stearns for the benefit of Ghislaine Maxwell on October 19, 1999.

persons.name: Scott Dencker
persons.context: Listed as the account officer/service specialist for the Financial Trust Company, Inc. account at JPMorgan.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the beneficiary of an $18.3 million wire transfer from the Financial Trust Company, Inc. account to Bear Stearns on October 19, 1999.

connections.description: The Financial Trust Company, Inc. account wired $18.3 million to Bear Stearns 'FAO GHISLAINE MAXWELL' on October 19, 1999.
Scott Dencker is listed as the account officer/service specialist for the Financial Trust Company, Inc. account at JPMorgan.

events.title: Wire Transfer to Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: An $18.3 million wire transfer was made from the Financial Trust Company, Inc. account at JPMorgan to Bear Stearns, for the benefit of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Large Purchase and Fund Transfer
events.description: A $20 million purchase of J.P. Morgan Institutional Prime Money Market Fund was made, funded by a transfer from brokerage account ACM 078859008.

events.title: Additional Purchase
events.description: A $5 million purchase of J.P. Morgan Institutional Prime Money Market Fund was made, funded by a transfer from the same brokerage account.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, New York, NY 10154-1002 (Morgan Guaranty Trust Company/JPMorgan address)
American Yacht Harbor (address for Financial Trust Company, Inc.)
keyFacts: A JPMorgan account for 'FINANCIAL TRUST COMPANY, INC.' held approximately $6.7 million in a money market fund in October 1999.
On October 19, 1999, the account wired $18.3 million to Bear Stearns 'FAO GHISLAINE MAXWELL'.
The document is marked 'Confidential Treatment Requested by JPMorgan' and is part of the legal discovery (JPM-SDNY-00036863 et seq.).
The account showed significant activity in early October 1999, with $25 million in purchases and $25 million in miscellaneous receipts, suggesting fund movements.
Scott Dencker is identified as the account officer/service specialist for this trust company account.
